name: Yoko Tsuru
description: Yoko Tsuruis a vendor working at theKabuki RoundaboutEdgeNet shop located in theKabukisub-district ofWatson. During the job given to V by T-Bug, she will tellVthat she has been holding on toa daemonfor them that should work on any third-gencyberdeck. She remarks that there is an available access point available to test it out. When returning to her any time afterthe Konpeki Plaza heist, she will make remarks about T-Bugs passing and that she was found inside her apartment. If V completed Somewhat Damaged and looted at least one of the two crafting specs:
